attributes.action: Make JUNK MAIL illegal to be delivered anywhere in UK.
attributes.additional_details: HELP SAVING PAPER AND NERVS BY SIGNING THIS PETITION!
attributes.background: Junk Mail has been a problem for everyone for years now and no one even looks at all the magazines or leaflets which are being delivered on a daily basis.If anyone needs a pizza a plumber or any other service internet comes 1st for finding a solution and not tonns of junk!
